rending needle: conductor.name: Rending Needle: Conductor
rending needle: conductor.desc: 5 metal rods will combine into a conductor rod. If an enemy uses a non-Ironsing elemental mantra, they're dealt their element back in turn.

rending needle: augmenter [lht].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [LHT]
rending needle: augmenter [lht].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

rending needle: augmenter [hvy].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [HVY]
rending needle: augmenter [hvy].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

rending needle: impaler.name: Rending Needle: Impaler
rending needle: impaler.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull instead pulls out all of the rods for massive damage.

conductor's cable.name: Conductor's Cable
conductor's cable.desc: Applying Conductor rods on opponents steals some of their armor to you.

rending needle: jailer.name: Rending Needle: Jailer
rending needle: jailer.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will restrain them instead of pulling them.

rending needle: augmenter [med].name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [MED]
rending needle: augmenter [med].desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.
exclusive: Rending Needle: Conductor. Rending Needle: Augmenter [HVY]
